name: HappyFacts
0:
”Alexa, ask Happy Facts for a fact.”
”Alexa, ask Happy Facts to give me a happy fact.”
”Alexa, tell Happy Facts for another fact”
skdetail:

Invocation Name: happy facts
des: This skill is full of interesting facts that will make you smile, and regain a little of your faith in humanity!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
